text: Daria quickly established herself as the technical mentor for her team. She digs deep into code to understand completely what is happening under the hood, and continually impressed us with her skill.
In technical discussions, Daria has a stunning ability to express her point of view respectfully and move the team towards a solution in a productive manner.

While Daria's skills as a developer and ability to quickly pick up technical skills are clearly amazing, it's her ability to critically assess problems and present them in a succinct manner that sets her apart.

Daria's diverse experience makes her an invaluable asset as a client-facing engineer capable of balancing sales, presentation skills and the ability to explain technical concepts in an accessible way.
Whenever our team was in need of direction, Daria always stepped up to guide us toward our goals.
Daria possesses the crucial skills of a small company employee: the ability to self-manage and to continue making an impact while keeping track of changing priorities.

Daria possesses crucial skills of a small company employee: the ability to self-manage and to continue making an impact while keeping track of changing priorities.
Daria's 'MVP' status of our group is a true testament to her outstanding work ethic and critical thinking.
One of Daria's strengths is being self-aware enough to accept feedback without ego and put the team's needs first by being fair and humble.
